Package com.kneelawk.graphlib.debugrender.api.graph

Interface BlockNodeDebugPacketEncoder

public interface BlockNodeDebugPacketEncoder
Encodes a BlockNode for sending to the client-side debug renderer.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    encode(BlockNode node, NodeHolder<BlockNode> self, net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf buf)
    Encodes a BlockNode for sending to the client-side debug renderer.

  • Method Details

    • encode

      void encode(BlockNode node, NodeHolder<BlockNode> self, net.minecraft.network.FriendlyByteBuf buf)
      Encodes a BlockNode for sending to the client-side debug renderer.

      The default implementations of this method are compatible with the default client-side block node decoders. This interface does not need to be implemented in order for client-side graph debug rendering to work. This interface should only be implemented to provide custom data to the client.

      If custom data is being sent to the client, use GraphLibDebugRenderClient.registerDebugDecoder(ResourceLocation, ResourceLocation, BlockNodeDebugPacketDecoder) to register a decoder for the custom data.

      Parameters:
      node - the node to encode.
      self - the node holder for context.
      buf - the buffer to write to.
